# GWAstudioX - Digital Marketing & Web Design Agency

## About Us
GWAstudioX is a premier digital marketing and web design agency based in Bangalore, India. We specialize in creating high-performance websites and data-driven marketing strategies that drive growth for businesses.

## Core Services
- **Web Design & Development:** Custom websites, e-commerce platforms, and landing pages with a focus on UI/UX and mobile responsiveness.
- **Digital Marketing:** SEO (Search Engine Optimization), SEM (Search Engine Marketing), and Social Media Marketing.
- **Content Marketing:** High-quality content creation, blog management, and copywriting.
- **Branding:** Logo design, brand identity, and visual storytelling.
- **Photography & Videography:** Professional event photography (Weddings, Corporate) and short-form video reels.

## Contact Information
- **Location:** Bangalore, Karnataka, India
- **Email:** contact@gwastudiox.com
- **Phone:** +91 62384 20550
- **Website:** https://gwastudiox.com

## Pricing
We offer customized packages based on client needs. Contact us for a free consultation and quote.

## FAQ
**Q: Do you work with small businesses?**
A: Yes, we work with startups, SMEs, and large enterprises.

**Q: What is your typical turnaround time for a website?**
A: A standard business website typically takes 2-4 weeks, while e-commerce sites may take 4-8 weeks.

**Q: Do you offer SEO services?**
A: Yes, all our websites are built with SEO best practices, and we offer ongoing SEO retainer packages.
